track.name: Blue Monk
comments:
Grei Chinesen mit  'nem Kontrabass saßen auf der Sraße und erzählten sich 'was
DA KAM DIE POLIZEI !!!! ja was soll denn das ?
Sitting here with my feet in the water the sun is hot and the music is so cool
Drie Chinese met die double bass, op die straat sit en vertel mekaar wat. Toe het die polisie, so wat is dit? Drie Chinese met die bas.
Been a long time since I heard this.

I am currently listening toi the version off 'Art Blakey & the Jazz Messengers with Thelonious Monk' which is a wonderful and highly-recommended (by me, anyway!) album. I love the way Art and Monk played together, Art always loved Monk for his percussive style of piano
should be sent to the ends of the universe so others can know the genius of man on earth.
One of the great jazz tunes of all time!
